name: Safavieh_Indoor_Outdoor_Ocean_Natural_Blue_Rug_(4'_x_5'7)
reviews: Exactly what I was looking for at a good price.
I would like to thank overstock.com again for my purchase! Very durable, inviting and can work as indoor or out. I love them and especially for he price.

This is such a nice looking "rug". I'm using it in my kitchen so I consider it more of a mat. The color (I got the blue) was really rich and there are blue threads in the background of the beige field. Nice touch. I thought I was getting a 4 x 6 but it really measured 4 x 5'7". All in all an excellent value.
I'm using this in the foyer, as it is very durable, but attractive. It lies flat on the floor, which has been a problem with other jute type rugs.
description: Safavieh's Courtyard collection creates a dynamic presence with its fashionable and transitional designs that are suited for both indoor and outdoor settings. These rugs have been expertly power loomed of enhanced polypropylene to create intricate motifs and ensure a comfortable surface underfoot. For outdoor use, this rug will turn your deck, poolside, or patio into a resort-style entertaining space.
